author: "Peter Menzies"
date: "10/13/2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
tornadoes <- read_csv(here("data", "1950-2019_all_tornadoes.csv"))
```

```{r}
maumelle_tornadoes <- tornadoes %>% 
  filter(mag >= 3) %>% 
  filter(slat > 34 & slat < 35.5) %>% 
  filter(slon > -91.5 & slon < -90) %>% 
  filter(yr > 2006) %>% 
  select(date, time, mag, slat:len)
```

```{r}
mau_water <- ggplot(water, aes(x = Date, y = turbidity_fnu)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_vline()
```
